column2: "Iyi ekyir no ɔbaa dɛ Ammonmba hɔn hen no wui
column3: na ne ba Hanun bedzii hen wɔ n’ananmu."

column4: dɛ mbrɛ n’egya yɛɛ me ayamuyie no. Nna David dze duaa no nkowaa do somaa dɛ wɔnkɛkyekye no werɛ wɔ n’egya ho. Na David no nkowaa no baa Ammonmba asaase no do."

column2: "Nna Ammonmba asafohemfo no see hɔn wura Hanun dɛ
column3: Ana edwen dɛ David dzi w’egya nyi ntsi na ɔasoma akyekyewerɛfo wɔ wo nkyɛn yi? Ana David annsoma no nkowaa wɔ wo nkyɛn dɛ wɔmbɔhwehwɛ kurow yi mu

column2: "Nna Hanun faa David no nkowaa no
column3: na oyiyii hɔn mbɔdwesa fa fa
column4: na otwitwaa hɔn ntar mu finimfin finimfin araa dze bodur hɔn nserɛ ekyir

column3: ɔsomae ma wokehyiaa hɔn kwan; osiandɛ woegu mbarimba no enyim ase kɛse. Na ɔhen no see dɛ
column4: Hom ntsintsim wɔ Jeriko ma onkodu dɛ hom mbɔdwesa bofuw ana nkyii hom asan aba."

column2: "Na aber a Ammonmba no hun dɛ hɔn ho abɔn David no
column3: Ammonmba no somaa ma wɔkɔbɔɔ Siriafo a wɔwɔ Bɛt-rehob na Zoba paa
column4: anamɔnmufo mpemeduonu na Maakahen no nye mbarimba apem
na mbarimba akatakyi dɔm no nyinara ma wɔkɔree."

column3: na wɔbaabaa mpasuar wɔ kuropon no n’ahɛnee: na Zoba
column6: nko gyinae wɔ haban no mu."

column2: "Afei aber a Joab hun dɛ ɔko no wɔ n’enyim na n’ekyir no
column3: ɔpaa Israel mu mbarimba a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no mu bi
column4: na ɔmaa wɔkɔree kehyiaa Siriafo no:"

column3: ɔdze hɔn hyɛɛ no nua Abishai nsa
Sɛ Siriafo no yɛ dzen dodow ma me a
column4: ɔno bɔboa me: na sɛ Ammonmba no yɛ dzen dodow ma wo a

column3: na ma yɛnyɛ hɛnho mbarimba mma hɛn man
column4: na hɛn Nyankopɔn no nkurow no: na EWURADZE nyɛ dza oye wɔ n’enyiwa do."

column2: "Nna Joab na nkorɔfo a wɔka no ho no twee pinii nye Siriafo no dze bɔɔ enyim: na woguanee wɔ n’enyim."
"Na aber a Ammonmba no hun dɛ Siriafo no eguan no
column3: nna hɔn so woguanee wɔ Abishai n’enyim
column4: na wɔkɛhɛɛn kurow no mu. Nna Joab fii Ammonmba no ho sanee

column2: "Na aber a Siriafo no hun dɛ woegu wɔ Israel enyim no
"Na Hadadezer somae ma wɔkɛfaa Siriafo no a wɔwɔ Esutsen no egya no puei bae: na wɔbaa Helam
column3: dɛ Hadadezer no dɔm safohen panyin Sobak na odzi hɔn enyim."

column2: "Na wɔbɛkaa kyerɛɛ David; na ɔpoon Israel nyinara hyiae
column3: na okotwaa Jordan kɔr Helam. Na Siriafo no baa mpasuar hyiaa David

column2: "Na Siriafo no guanee wɔ Israel enyim; na David kunkum Siriafo no ntseaseanam ahaesuon mu nyimpa
column4: na ɔkaa hɔn dɔm safohen panyin Sobak gya

column2: "Na aber a ahemfo a wɔyɛ nkowaa ma Hadadezer no nyinara hun dɛ woegu wɔ Israel enyim no
column4: na wɔsoom hɔn. Nna Siriafo no suroo dɛ wɔbɔboa Ammonmba no bio."
